history.content: I'm in the process of gathering subjects for some linguistics research I've been working on. We are analyzing cross-language speech perception, focusing on the ability of native English speakers to perceive differences in words from the Amazonian language Panara. This only takes about half an hour, and you will be paid for your time. If you are interested at all, feel free to email me at chrismitchell@berkeley.edu and we can work out a time!
history.subject: Linguistics Experiment Opportunity
